BotCommand.name: asm68k
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: asm68k <u>instruction<u> Returns the hex code for the specified <u>instruction<u>.

BotCommand.name: vdpcalc
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: vdpcalc <u>type<u> <u>mode<u> <u>address<u> Returns a hex version of the VDP command. <u>type<u> can be vram, vsram, or cram; <u>mode<u> can be read, write or dma; <u>address<u> is the hexadecimal address. Syntax: vdpcalc <u>command<u> Converts a VDP <u>command<u> into a human-readable format.

BotCommand.name: vdp
BotCommand.HelpText: Syntax: vdp <u>type<u> <u>mode<u> <u>address<u> Returns a hex version of the VDP command. <u>type<u> can be vram, vsram, or cram; <u>mode<u> can be read, write or dma; <u>address<u> is the hexadecimal address. Syntax: vdp <u>command<u> Converts a VDP <u>command<u> into a human-readable format.
